attributes.action: read the Goldstone Report objectively and evaluate it accordingly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, are requesting that Britain's Prime Minister give Richard Goldstone's report on the Gaza conflict of 2008/9 full and due consideration; that he reads the report in its entirety and appraises it objectively. We request that the Prime Minister makes any evaluation of the report solely upon its contents, with utmost integrity, and lets the report stand or fall in his opinion on the basis of the report's merits, and on no other criteria - be they matters of personal proclivity, approbation, or political consideration. 

In short, we are requesting that the Prime Minister assess Richard Goldtone's report with equanimity, and gives it due justice come what may. 

With thanks.

rejection.details:
There are already several petitions relating to the Goldstone Report. Please check that your one does not overlap: 

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/unrep1/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GoldstoneReport/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/NoToGoldstone/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
